Text.val: 25.01.2013 SH SCR17893 Added calculation for concentration client (PI.LEVEL=5)
23.03.2011 GB SCR16256 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
27.07.2009 GB SCR14760 Added the parameter PO.CURRBALPAYMENTSETTLE
01.09.2008 SH SCR13915 Replaced LimitsAndConc client fields by Limit fields
-- Test on valid parameters, to avoid invalid SQL commands
-- Step 1: Select clients to handle, according to PI.LEVEL the selection of

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALDEBTORS) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALFACTACC) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALSPECIALACC) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALSETTLEMENTACC) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALPAYMENTSETTLE) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON join :1/CLNT on CMON_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and :2 where CMON_YEAR = :3 and CMON_MONTH = :4 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':5' for fetch only

select cast(sum(CMCD_SPECIALACCOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMCD join :1/CLNT on CMCD_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMCD_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and :2 where (CMCD_MARKCODE = :3 or CMCD_MARKCODE = :4) for fetch only
